sub_title: General Manager; Business development; Interim Manager; Consultancy
summary:
• Over 30 years experience in general management, sales, operations and finance
• Entrepreneur and founder of companies in telecommunications consultancy, technical trade and agritech.
• Corporate management experience in AT&T
• CEO and COO in software development companies
• CEO of start-up/scale-up
• Creator of unique successful business concepts and products in multiple business sectors
• Experienced in mergers, acquisitions, alliances and private equity
• Combines people management with serious interest in operational excellence
• International and professionally trained at MSc and MBA level

Hein has (1) significant work experience in a multinational corporation, as (2) founder/entrepreneur of 4 companies and (3) working on contract basis in predominantly leadership and advisor positions. General management, financing, strategy, project management, product innovation, negotiations, sales/purchasing and contract management have been day-to-day core-activities. 

Specialities: General Management, Business development, Private Equity, Financing, Management Consultancy, Mergers and Acquisitions, Telecommunications, Voice-recognition software and applications, Technical trade in castings/forgings, Agri-fiber conversion, Agri-tech, Business development consultancy

(1) Agri-tech (Yellow Pallet)
(2) Technical trade business (Prins Metallurgische Producten and Chinforce)
(3) ICT (Carepay and Barito, Amsterdam RAI, NTiM). 
(4) New customers

In the past 10 years most of the management services were executed for co-owned Yellow Pallet. Chinforce, Barito and NTiM are companies co-founded, developed, sold. Before 2008, Hefort was a software development company (technology: J2EE and VoiceXML) and operated under the name Barito. Examples of products: "Voice Assess": the first on-line assessment software using voice recognition to save costs and improve quality in hiring contact center staff used by Adecco. "Fairwise": the first Event Management Software used by the large ICT-events in Amsterdam RAI (i.e. IBC, Internetworking) and the Jaarbeurs. Barito's subsidiaries have been sold in 2008 and the name was changed into Hefort. In 2000 the company acted under the name AmstelSuites.
